name: Carrot Walnut Cake
description: Deeply moist carrot cake with walnuts, coated with tangy cream cheese frosting.

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
description: A silky-smooth classic cheesecake on a graham cracker crust with fresh strawberries and homemade strawberry sauce on top.

name: Blueberry Cheesecake
description: A buttery graham cracker crust, a classic creamy and smooth cheesecake center, a tangy blueberry sauce topping, and is coated with whipped cream.

name: Mango Mille Crepe
description: An elegant and delectable crepe cake made of thin layers of simple French crepes stacked between layers of lightly sweetened cream and fresh mangoes. It’s Mangonificent!

name: Strawberry Tres Leches
description: Layers of a wonderful light sponge cake soaked in a mixture of THREE kinds of milk with layers of strawberry filling and whipped cream, topped with fresh strawberries.

name: Classic Tres Leches
description: Two layers of extremely light sponge cake soaked in THREE kinds of milk, topped with whipped cream, and dusted with cinnamon. It’s sweet, refreshing, and exceptionally delicious.

name: Chocolate Crinkles (25pcs)
description: A decadently rich, soft, and fudge-like chocolate cookie with a contrasting coating of powdered sugar. A bite of this dark chocolatey goodness will leave you craving for more.

name: Chocolate Crinkles (5pcs)
description: A decadently rich, soft, and fudge-like chocolate cookie with a contrasting coating of powdered sugar. A bite of this dark chocolatey goodness will leave you craving for more.

name: Chocolate Brownies (6pcs)
description: A fudgy chocolate brownie that is gooey on the inside, crackly on top and is surely a crowd-pleasing dessert.

name: Chocolate Croissant
description: A flakey and buttery croissant stuffed with chocolate pieces in the center.
